ygData.subject: Unimatrix Series Review
ygData.msgSnippet: The high points of my review: 1)Creating new maps would be really nice. 2)along the same line, test out the scenarios.  Tents placed in a forest won t work.

The high points of my review:

1)Creating new maps would be really nice.

2)along the same line, test out the scenarios.  Tents placed in a 
forest won't work.  Also, I don't appreciate my team members being 
placed inside rocks, forest, etc where they lose health points right 
off the bat.  Also, all scenario numbers above 409 won't work on my 
PC.  Do you manually edit those scenario files?

3)in general, high experience level mages and archmages are a VERY BAD 
idea.  In the case of mages, they can freeze time: for opponent mages, 
this allows your opponents to beat you without having a chance; for 
friendly mages, this sure makes it easy to run out of mana really 
quick.  In the case of archmages, chain-lightning can quickly short 
circuit any scenario.  Also, mind-control can became abused by making 
the last opponents team mates.

4)NPC help - in general, please don't provide a literal 30+ army to 
assist my team.  It can cause potential problems if you are facing 
enemy archmages (see above) and makes it that much harder for me to 
scroll through my own hired troops.

No offense, but these scenarios need more work done on them.
